item.description:
NEW NEWS:

1. We now have Music and Dancing!! (I could use a few really good CD's for dance music, any offers?)

2. Two $25.00 Gift Certificates from Vito's for the Best Dressed Man and Woman. A three- panel team of judges will pick the winners. Dress to dazzle!

3. We have a New RSVP Date from the Restaurant : Saturday, December 5 at noon.

4. At the moment, we have close to 70 Singles.. The restaurant says we can have 30 - plus more! Party On!!!!

How excited are you about this news???? Who will win the Gift Certificates?????

( If you can, exact change would be great. $ 25.00, plus One Little Single for the Meet Up)
HOLIDAY PARTY

FOR SINGLES!!!!

With The Ira

LET THE HOLIDAY PARTY SEASON BEGIN!!!!



NEW BEAUTIFUL VENUE. ON THE WATER, WITH A RELAXING VIEW.

COME, UNWIND. EAT, DRINK, AND BE MERRY, PLUS, MEET MANY NEW MEN AND WOMEN, JUST IN TIME FOR THE HOLIDAY SEASON AND NEW YEAR’S EVE (in case you are looking for a date).



WHEN: December 5, Saturday night

(No work the next day!)



WHERE: VITO’S BY THE WATER

1936 Blue Hills Ave. Ext.

Windsor, CT 06096

860-285-8660

(It is absolutely worth the drive. Easy to get to)



Food Served from 7 to 9 p.m.



· Unlimited Mouth- Watering, World Famous Pizza for 2 hours.
Salads Galore

· Hand- Crafted Antipasto

· A surprise for the Vegetarians

· One Drink Ticket for House Specials.

· ( If you do not drink, simply sell your drink ticket)

Private Room and Wait Staff


COST FOR THE ABOVE PER PERSON- $25.



BAR DETAILS: CASH BAR. HAPPY HOUR BAR PRICES FROM 7:00PM to 9:00PM. (Individual Bar Tabs). After 9:00PM, regular Bar Pricing Prevails.



MARTINIS $5.00. BEER AND WINE $3.00. MIXED DRINKS $5.00 (Prices are for House Specials).



THE LATEST NEWS



Organized Happy Hours by The IRA have been a tremendous success. All who attend enjoy themselves with food, beverages, and most important, MINGLING AT ITS VERY BEST. Name Tags, Fun Mingling Activities, and a personal introduction to each person who attends, assures that even the most quiet/shy person will meet everyone there!!!



Dress to Impress. We always need more men; let’s not disappoint the wonderful ladies that attend.











Please RSVP no later than 12:00PM, Saturday, 12/5/09 so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare.



Ira Wettenstein: 860-604-5792

mistrchrming@aol.com
item.how_to_find_us: Large Group of Singles Having Fun. Sign will be posted

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Ira- Pre Holiday Singles Holiday Party on a Saturday Night in December
